synopsis.text: Yan's Promise Unfolds: The young Xiao Yan, once humiliated by the abrupt cancellation of his engagement to Na Lan Yan Ran, embarks on a relentless quest for redemption. He dedicates three years to rigorous training, traversing the harsh terrains of Magic Beast Mountain and the unforgiving Tagore Desert. Through the painstaking process of refining pills and enduring the agony of consuming foreign fire, Xiao Yan transforms himself, embodying the adage, 'Never underestimate the young'. As the three-year pact with Na Lan Yan Ran reaches its climax, Xiao Yan stands poised to reclaim his honor and usher in a new chapter for the Xiao family. Witness the unfolding of Xiao Yan's journey of growth and self-discovery, as he challenges the past and embraces the future.
